title: ad hominem 4 albums
description:
Ad Hominem

Country of origin:France
Location:Southern France (early), Novara, Piedmont, Italy (now)
Status:Active
Formed in:1998
Genre:Black Metal
Lyrical themes:Anti-Monotheism/ZOG, Cult of the Self, Genocide
Current label:Osmose Productions
Years active:1998-present
Ad Hominem is a one-man-band created and run by Kaiser. The project was born in France and is now evolving in Italy.

After years of polemics, Kaiser keeps on claiming that A.H. never ever dealt with politics, but used and uses to support any extreme ideologies/acts aiming at eradicating what corrupts the identity of Man. Therefore, A.H. should not be considered as NSBM since national-socialism ...

Ad Hominem - A New Race For A New World - 2003
Ad Hominem - Climax Of Hatred - 2005
Ad Hominem - Dictator - A Monument Of Glory - 2009
Ad Hominem - Planet ZOG - The End - 2002
